SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem

Class Question

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a Question, storing the question content, options, answer, and score

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.StringProperty
    answer
    Retrieves a StringProperty representation of the correct answer(s) for this question.

    content
    Retrieves a StringProperty representation of the content of this question.

    score
    Retrieves an IntegerProperty representation of the score associated with this question.

    typeChoice
    Retrieves an IntegerProperty representation of the type of choice for this question.

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String content, ArrayList<String> options, String answer, int score, int typeChoice)
      Constructs a new Question object with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the question.
      options - An ArrayList containing multiple choice options.
      answer - A string representing the correct answer(s) to the question.
      score - The score assigned to this question.
      typeChoice - The type of choice for the question (0 for single choice, 1 for multi-choice).

    • Question

      public Question(String content, String[] options, String answer, int score, int typeChoice)

      options - An array of strings containing multiple choice options.
      answer - A string representing the correct answer(s) to the question.
      score - The score assigned to this question.
      typeChoice - The type of choice for the question (0 for single choice, 1 for multi-choice).

    • Question

      content - The content of the question.
      options - An ArrayList containing multiple choice options.
      answer - A string representing the correct answer(s) to the question.
      score - The score assigned to this question.
      typeChoice - The type of choice for the question ("Single" for single choice, other values for multi-choice).

      public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty answerProperty()
      Retrieves a StringProperty representation of the correct answer(s) for this question.
      Returns:
